author: The Conversation
title: All the coronavirus antivirals and vaccine research projects being fast-tracked right now
description: Just three months after China first notified the World Health Organization about a deadly new coronavirus, studies of numerous antiviral treatments and potential vaccines are already underway. Never has science advanced so much in such a short period of time …
